name: Punicapp
description:
PunicApp was founded in 2011. Since then we’ve obtained significant experience in the development of mobile and web applications, brought various difficult projects to life.
Projects with clients as Toyota, Datsun, Guiness and others. We’ve also worked with digital agencies: EMCG, Global Point, iEngage, BBDO-Russia.

We offer all in one services which include mobile apps, web development, integration with CRM, CMS and any automation system. We develop native mobile applications for iOS, Android and Windows Mobile, server side (Front-end, Back-end and API).
PunicApp strives to solve every need of the client. Our personal approach is making the process 100 percent transparent and interactive. The professional team is usually able to suggest cheaper and more effective ways to achieve your business goals.
We do not ask incomprehensible questions and always ready to assist you in every step of the way: from writing the technical specification to sales promotional merchandising.
